Name: Strawberry & Balsamic Mojito
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries in base of glass. Add next 5 ingredients to glass and two-thirds will with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice. TOP with splash of soda, briefly stir and serve.
Review: A fruity twist on the classic Mojito.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Simon 'Ginge' Warneford at Blanch House in Brighton, England. Mojito Cocktail history
